solution_line_template: 10 champions have been men because {total_champions_years} x {men_percent_as_decimal} = <<{total_champions_years}*{men_percent_as_decimal}={num_men_champions}>>{num_men_champions}
4 champions have been men with beards because {num_men_champions} x {beard_percent_as_decimal} = <<{num_men_champions}*{beard_percent_as_decimal}={num_men_with_beards}>>{num_men_with_beards}
